text: Karl Ritter von Czyhlarz, or Karel Cihlář (August 17, 1833, Lovosice, Bohemia - July 21, 1914, Vienna) was a Bohemian-Austrian jurist, politician. He taught as a professor at the Charles University in Prague (1858-1892), University of Vienna (1892-1904). He was a specialist of the Roman law. He was a member of an assembly of Bohemia (1866-1886), and a member of the Upper Chamber of the Austrian Reichsrat (1898-). == Literary works == * Lehrbuch der Institutionen des römischen Rechts, 1933 ==External links== * Das weltweite Österreich Journal - für Österreicherinnen und Österreicher in aller Welt at oe- journal.at * Representatives of Viennese Scholarship at www.univie.ac.at * AEIOU * http://epub.oeaw.ac.at/oebl/oebl_C/Czyhlarz_Karl_1833_1914.xml Category:1833 births Category:1914 deaths Category:People from Lovosice Category:People from the Kingdom of Bohemia Category:Austrian knights Category:Members of the House of Lords (Austria) Category:Austrian politicians Category:Austrian jurists Category:Recipients of the Order of the Iron Crown (Austria) Category:Members of the Bohemian Diet Category:German Bohemian people Category:Austrian people of German Bohemian descent
title: Karl von Czyhlarz
